Democrat Zohran Mamdani wins New York City mayor’s race
subhead: The 34-year-old state lawmaker from Queens, who defeated former Gov. Andrew Cuomo and Republican Curtis Sliwa, is a self-described democratic socialist and will be the city’s youngest mayor in over a century.

subhead: In an interview with Le Monde, the former French foreign affairs minister, who sealed the 2015 Paris Agreement on climate change, voices concern over the current international and political context as the summit for heads of state at the 30th United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP30) opens on November 6 in Belem, Brazil.

title: Understanding Shein's sex doll scandal in five questions
subhead: After France's consumer watchdog found childlike sex dolls on Shein's site, the Chinese e-commerce platform said it would 'fully cooperate with the judicial authorities,' raising questions about its content moderation.

title: A tunnel between Morocco and Spain and an old dream revived
subhead: Since the 19th century, the idea of a fixed link between Morocco and Europe has seen slow but steady progress. If realized, the project could transform the movement of people and goods across the western Mediterranean.

title: How healthy is the Amazon, the world's largest tropical rainforest?
subhead: Brazil, which is hosting the 30th United Nations Climate Change Conference (COP30) in the city of Belem, aims to highlight the urgent need to protect the Amazon's vital ecosystem, which faces multiple threats.

subhead: A planet at +1.5°C 6/6. Persistent drought, record temperatures, wildfires: Faced with the most acute effects of global warming, residents of the Aude department in southern France are looking for ways to keep their region alive.

title: US Democrats, defeated by Trump a year ago, grapple with a grassroots rebellion
subhead: As Tuesday's special elections approach, the party is fractured, with no clear leader or unified message, as activists push for new priorities and a shake-up of its entrenched establishment.

title: Laurent Mauvignier wins 2025 Prix Goncourt for 'La Maison vide'
